summary: San Sebastián is a city in Spain, located in the Basque region near the French border. It has a population of around 188,000 people and is known for its beautiful coast and popular tourism. The city is famous for its film and jazz festivals, which attract visitors from around the world. San Sebastián's economy is mostly based on tourism and commerce. In 2016, it was named a European Capital of Culture, sharing the title with Wrocław, Poland.
title: San Sebastián
